p: Collected blood was layered on 1077 Histopaque (Sigma, 10771) and centrifuged at 200× g for 10 min. Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) were collected from the gradient interface. The plasma suspension was combined and washed three times with phosphate buffered saline and then centrifuged at 200× g for 10 min. After the suspension was removed, 1 mL RNAzol reagent (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) was added, and the result was stored at −80°C.
